PropertyList.title: Help and Shortcuts
PropertyList.text:
Available documentation can be viewed in the "Documentation" menu.
2D versions of certain cockpit panels are included to make certain tasks easier. These can be opened from the "2D Panels" menu.
Aircraft Configuration Center: Used to load panel states and set ground equipment, as well as configure simulation and aircraft options.
Simulation: * IRS Aligns Instantly: Skips the ~10 minute alignment process of the IRS (if equipped). * Keyboard Mode: Maps flight controls to number pad and number rows instead of view shortcuts. * Open When FlightGear Starts: Opens the Aircraft Configuration Center automatically when FlightGear starts. * Separate Tiller Axis: Separates the tiller from the rudder and maps it to /controls/gear/steering.
Aircraft: * Armed Altitude as Flight Levels: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to show flight level on the FMA. * Auto Arm Altitude: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to automatically arm altitude. * Firetank Equipped: Equips the aircraft with the firefighting tank and system (MD-87 only). * Firetank Uses Water: Causes the firetank to be filled with water instead of fire retardant (MD-87 only). * Rising Runway Equipped: Equips the PFD with the rising runway indication (EFIS panel only).
Panel Configuration: * Combined Standby: Equips the aircraft with the combined standby instead of split instruments (MD-81/82/83 only). * Dual Cue Flight Director: Equips the PFD with the dual cue (cross bars) flight director (requires EFIS). * EDP & SDP Equipped: Equips the aircraft with the Engine Display Panel and System Display Panel (requires EFIS). * EFIS Equipped: Equips the aircraft with the EADI and EHSI electronic flight instruments. * FMS Option: Select between the HT9100 with AHRS, or the AFMS with IRS (AFMS/IRS requires EFIS).
